title: FireFox won't start
content:
My husband, Wayne, a casual computer user, has been having trouble getting into Firefox for some time. He's been getting along on MS Edge since then. He wants to get back to Firefox for his bookmarks that are there. His problem is that Firefox doesn't start. When he tries to start it, a gray window appears briefly with a rotating blue circle and then disappears in less than a minute. While it's up, Firefox shows up in Task Manager with "not responding" or "suspended" or nothing. I note that the last Firefox update was 6/14/2022 according to the date modified on the file in Crash Reports, InstallTime2022060832. This is about the time he began having problems.

During the brief time it's up, there is no menu button (3 short lines), so Refreshing or Troubleshooting are not options. I believe my only option is to Uninstall (without removing user data) and then reinstall Firefox, ie a "Clean Install". I see an option to Refresh during the Uninstall dialog. Might that work? Barbara
creator: webutl

content:

title: How to back up Firefox url suggestion info
content: I'm not exactly sure what this is called. Maybe it's in the cache, but I don't know. One of the fastest timesavers I have is that I use the Firefox url feature that makes suggestions as soon as I start typing a url. I pull up dozens, possibly hundreds of articles that I refer to frequently this way, so that I don't have to bother bookmarking them. I don't clear the cache, to keep these references from disappearing. I have to move computers now. My longtime mac is not working well anymore. Is there any way to bring these url suggestions with me when I migrate? Thank you.

title: Themes are synced even though I've disabled it with lightweightThemes and activeThemeID
content:
Hello,

I have 3 different profiles and I'd like to have a visual indication of the currently active profile. I've found that using themes is the best option (a red theme for production, green for test, grey for default) but I can't prevent Firefox Sync to sync the active theme between my profiles.

I have set both services.sync.prefs.sync.extensions.activeThemeID and services.sync.prefs.sync.lightweightThemes to false and restarted all my Firefox profiles.

After a while, all windows/profiles are synced to the same theme.

Are those settings really read by Firefox Sync ? I'm on Windows 10, Firefox 91.10.0esr (32-bit)

Thanks in advance for your help !
creator: geoced

title: Cached Web Content Not Clearing
content:
Win 7 Home Premium Firefox Version 101.0.1

When 'Clear Now,' Cached Web Content; is clicked, it does not zero out. (It used to clear completely).

The browser webpage has been refreshed, the browser closed and reopened, and the computer restarted but the cache does not reset.

This issue started on the morning (Pacific time) of June 26-Is this a known glitch or am I missing a detail?

title: wxmaxima help that uses firefox cannot find the on disk html help  files
content:
I run wxmaxima on ubunbtu 20.04. The help menu option calls up firefox (v 101.0.1 (64 bit)) to find the local on disk html files. However this brings up the error message:

File not found

Firefox can’t find the file at /usr/share/maxima/5.45.1/doc/html/maxima_singlepage.html#g_t_0025.

But this is a valid path with user access permissions and the file maxima_singlepage.html exists and has user read permissions.

So what is firefox doing in looking for this file?

I have used the ms windows 10 version of wxmaxima and the firefox help works perfectly.

Hola

Llevo tiempo usando el Navegador y nunca había tenido este problema. Hace unos meses formatié y se sincronizó todo con solo iniciar sesión en el navegador. Necesito ayuda, gracias!
creator: julike.moreno

title: Los servicios de Google no cargan o van lentos
content:
Desde hace unos días, las páginas del grupo Google no cargan o van muy lentas. Lo he notado especialmente en la búsqueda de Google y en Youtube. -La búsqueda se queda 4-5 segundos en blanco antes de cargar. -Al buscar en Google Imágenes, el problema se hace más evidente: al hacer clic en una imagen, el navegador se queda en blanco. -En Youtube, al hacer clic en un vídeo la página se queda cargando eternamente. Solo logra cargar si reinicio el navegador y lo vuelvo a abrir manteniendo la sesión anterior, con lo que logro que el vídeo y la descripción carguen, pero no la sección de comentarios. De nuevo, al abrir un vídeo distinto en esta nueva sección se queda en blanco, cargando indefinidamente.

He probado a limpiar el caché y las cookies de google, he reinstalado Firefox, he probado deshabilitando complementos e incluso he cambiado security.tls.enable_0rtt_data a false, como se recomienda en temas de ayuda similares, pero no lo soluciona.
creator: orphenkirisame
